verbs.description: President Trump ’s May 8 announcement that he [V: was] withdrawing from the Iran nuclear deal should not have come as a surprise . He ’d spent years railing against the plan—“the worst deal ever , ” he dubbed it — and had promised to rip it up . And yet up to the moment when the president made the final call , there was still some suspense about what he would say . This was not merely wishful thinking by the deal ’s backers , though it was partly that . It was not ...
